predicate.note: Frames file for 'deploy' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry at the moment. Did this and 'redeploy' at the same time.

roleset.name: set into place

example.name: passivized
example.text: But more recently, the pound has been falling with high inflation, which has also seemed almost impervious to the high interest rates *trace* Mr. Lawson deployed *trace* to stop it.

roleset.note: Secondary predication doesn't seem to appear with deploy, only with redeploy. Makes me wonder about its validity.
